OrgName: Pharmaceutical Product Development, LLC and its US Subsidiaries
activities: Pharmaceutical Product Development, LLC (PPD) is a leading global contract research organization providing drug discovery, development and lifecycle management services. Our clients and partners include pharmaceutical, biotechnology, medical device, academic and government organizations. During the conduct of its business, PPD processes personal data relating to study participants and study investigators, and their staff, callers to medical information contact centers, vendors, subcontractors, consultants, applicants and employee data.  Due to the global nature of its activities PPD may transfer personal data between members of the European Union and the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, HR Data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
